register.description: Peripheral ID register

bitfield.description: Peripheral ID register

register.description: IPE3 cycle counter register Determines the cycle number between start of IPE3 core and end (interrupt generation). Can be used for debugging.

bitfield.description: Counter enable 0: Benchmark counter is disabled. 1: Benchmark counter is enabled.
Counter reset 0: No effect 1: Clear the benchmark counter to 0.
Reserved. Read returns 0 and Write is ignored.
Current value of the benchmark counter. When CNT_EN is 1 and IP is busy (IPE3_EN==1), the benchmark counter counts up based on clk. Write access has no effect.

register.description: IPE3 control register

bitfield.description: Reserved. Read returns 0 and Write is ignored.

Address of parameter set. Parameter set can have 4 positions in full-view mode and 2 positions for ping-pong view mode. User must set the position to be processed. 0x0: Process first MB. 0x1: Process second MB. 0x2: Process third MB ( full-view mode only). 0x3: Process fourth MB ( full-view mode only). Do not write any value while IPE3 is running (while IPE3_EN is 1).
Reserved. Read returns 0 and Write is ignored.
Single-step mode. Stops processing even if continuous mode is set. 0: Normal mode 1: Single-step mode. Do not write any value while IPE3 is running (while IPE3_EN is 1).
Reserved. Read returns 0 and Write is ignored.

IPE3 start and status Setting this bit to 1 makes IPE3 start processing. This bit remains 1 while IPE3 is running and is cleared to 0 automatically after processing completes. Writing 0 to this bit has no effect.

register.description: Horizontal noise suppression register Do not write any value while IPE3 is running (while IPE3_EN is 1).

bitfield.description: Reserved. Read returns 0 and Write is ignored.

Bottom block status for horizontal noise suppression 0: Activity is not higher than H_threshold 1: Activity is higher than H_threshold. User can update the value. IPE3 module uses the value to process the next parameter set. No update at noise suppression disable and SACT mode.

Top block status for horizontal noise suppression 0: Activity is not higher than H_threshold. 1: Activity is higher than H_threshold. User can update the value. IPE3 module uses the value to process the next parameter set. No update at noise suppression disable and SACT mode.

register.description: nA mode register Do not write any value while IPE3 is running (while IPE3_EN is 1).

bitfield.description: Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 15 of bottom MB in the previous MB pair. IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 13 of bottom MB in the previous MB pair. IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 7 of bottom MB in the previous MB pair. IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 5 of bottom MB in the previous MB pair. IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 15 of left MB (or top MB in the previous MB pair in case of MBAFF). IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 13 of left MB (or top MB in the previous MB pair in case of MBAFF). IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 7 of left MB (or top MB in the previous MB pair in case of MBAFF). IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.
Intraprediction mode of 4 x 4 block 5 of left MB (or top MB in the previous MB pair in case of MBAFF). IPE3 does not update in SACT mode.

register.description: Luma left neighboring data IPE3 reads this register value as Luma left samples at the beginning of estimation. Right-most current pixels are written at the end of estimation to use data as the left sample of the next MB. Do not write any value while IPE3 is running (while IPE3_EN is 1).

bitfield.description: Luma left sample for top MB line 3. The right-most luminance pixel of top MB line 3 in the left MB. The IPE3 always updates at the end of estimation automatically for the next MB.
Luma left sample for top MB line 2. The right-most luminance pixel of top MB line 2 in the left MB. The IPE3 always updates at the end of estimation automatically for the next MB.
Luma left sample for top MB line 1. The right-most luminance pixel of top MB line 1 in the left MB. The IPE3 always updates at the end of estimation automatically for the next MB.
Luma left sample for top MB line 0. The right-most luminance pixel of top MB line 0 in the left MB. The IPE3 always updates at the end of estimation automatically for the next MB.
